docBody.head: Is Motherhood Sacred?
docBody.p: Reminded me of H.G. Wells prophecy.

Conditions of Social & Economic chaos today stem back to the careless, reckless, prolific breeding of our forebears who while giving up service to such ideas as the “Sacred work of Mother” the “Sacredness of Motherhood” did nothing to dignify or to enoble it or to protect the fundamental rights of mothers or to give them knowledge & freedom whereby Mothers could bring into the world only the number of children she could bear & rear as a service to the Country & to the race.

Motherhood throughout the ages has been the stepping stones for Oligarchies Kingdoms & Democracies. It has been the upon this Sacred function that Tyrants & War Lords have ascended to heights of renown.
